item.title: 贸易商称埃及购买俄罗斯小麦的协议没有进展
item.description: 埃及正在努力完成本月本应装船的俄罗斯小麦大宗采购，这引发了对市场上最大的两家公司之间交易的质疑。【原文：Egypt is struggling to complete a large purchase of Russian wheat that was due to be loaded this month, raising questions about the dealmaking between two of the largest players in the market.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行可能不会在七月前竞购德国商业银行：杰富瑞
item.description: 杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：UniCredit SpA should hold off making a bid for Commerzbank AG until the second half of next year to avoid triggering a mandatory cash offer, according to analysts at Jefferies Financial Group Inc.】

item.title: 战神公司和银行将为 KKR 收购埃尼公司少数股权提供资金
item.description: Ares Management Corp.和一批银行正在资助 KKR & Co.收购意大利 Enilive 公司的少数股权。【原文：Ares Management Corp. and a group of banks is funding KKR & Co.’s buyout of a minority stake in Italy’s Enilive.】

item.title: 黎巴嫩因 "黑钱 "问题被列入全球监督组织的 "灰名单
item.description: 黎巴嫩已被列入全球金融监督机构所谓的 "灰色名单"，该名单指的是在应对非法资金流动方面存在缺陷的国家，此举可能会加剧这个中东国家的经济危机。【原文：Lebanon has been added to a global financial watchdog’s so-called “gray list” denoting nations with shortcomings in tackling illicit financial flows, a move that may worsen the Middle Eastern country’s economic crisis.】

item.title: 必和必拓与淡水河谷就巴西大坝灾难达成 300 亿美元和解协议
item.description: 巴西已同意接受就淡水河谷公司（Vale SA）和必和必拓集团（BHP Group）的铁矿石合资企业 2015 年发生的矿难达成的 1,700 亿雷亚尔（合 299 亿美元）的和解协议。【原文：Brazil has agreed to accept a 170 billion-real ($29.9 billion) settlement for a 2015 mining disaster at Vale SA and BHP Group’s iron-ore joint venture.】

item.title: Waymo 完成来自 Alphabet 等公司的 56 亿美元融资
item.description: Alphabet 公司的自动驾驶部门 Waymo 从投资者那里筹集了 56 亿美元，这是其有史以来最大的一轮融资。【原文：Waymo, Alphabet Inc.’s autonomous driving unit, raised $5.6 billion from investors, its largest-ever funding round.】

item.title: 人工智能的电力需求可能对气候有利
item.description:
从化石燃料中获利的公司声称，从长远来看，数据中心带动的电力需求增长将引发对清洁能源的投资—  

。【原文：

Companies that profit from fossil fuels claim the increase in electricity demand driven by data centers will trigger investment in clean energy — in the long run.  

】

item.title: 象牙海岸可可贸易集团称出口商高价收购可可豆
item.description: 据熟悉内情的消息人士透露，象牙海岸一个贸易商团体的成员抱怨说，世界第一大可可豆种植国的一些主要出口商为确保其加工厂的可可豆供应而高价收购可可豆。【原文：Members of an Ivory Coast traders’ group have complained that some major exporters in the world’s top grower are overpaying for cocoa beans to secure supplies for their processing plants, according to sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 纳格尔称欧洲央行可能比预期更早实现 2% 的物价目标
item.description: 德国央行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，欧元区通胀率可能会提前放缓至欧洲央行的通胀目标。【原文：Euro-area inflation may slow to the European Central Bank’s inflation target earlier than anticipated, according to Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: 欧洲央行不应仓促降息或计划过早，瓦斯勒说
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员 Bostjan Vasle 认为，欧洲中央银行现在不应急于降息，也不应花费太长时间考虑降息的幅度和速度。【原文：The European Central Bank shouldn’t hurry to lower interest rates or spend too long right now contemplating how far and how quickly they should fall, according to Governing Council member Bostjan Vasle.】

item.title: 全球监督组织将塞内加尔从黑钱 "灰名单 "上除名
item.description: 塞内加尔已从全球黑钱名单中除名，此举可能会增强投资者的信心，因为本月一系列负面消息导致塞内加尔的欧元债券遭到抛售。【原文：Senegal has been removed from a global dirty-money list, a move likely to boost investor confidence after a spate of negative news led to a selloff of its eurobonds this month.】

item.title: 莫桑比克大选结果引发新一轮骚乱，局势岌岌可危
item.description: 周四晚间，莫桑比克首都爆发骚乱，当局宣布执政党在反对党称被操纵的选举中大获全胜。【原文：Tensions are high in Mozambique after riots broke out in the capital on Thursday night when authorities announced a resounding victory for the ruling party in an election the opposition said was rigged.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德重申通货紧缩 "进展顺利
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，消费价格的放缓仍在继续，但她强调工资压力带来的风险依然存在。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde affired that the slowdown in consumer prices is continuing, though she highlighted lingering risks from wage pressures.】

item.title: 硅谷精英倾资遮蔽阳光
item.description:
风险资本家、初创企业创始人和技术高管正在资助有争议技术的研究、实验和小规模部署，这些技术可能会给地球降温。【原文：

Venture capitalists, startup founders and tech executives are funding studies, experiments and small deployments of controversial technology that could cool the planet.

】

item.title: 《聪明的投资者》75 年后仍值得一读
item.description:
这本书与其说是在讲述如何赚钱，不如说是在讲述如何不做白痴。【原文：

The book is less about how to make money than how not to be an idiot.

】

item.title: 苏里南排除为价值 260 亿美元的油田借款的可能性
item.description: 苏里南即将成为南美主要的能源生产国，据苏里南财政部长称，苏里南排除了以未来石油产量为抵押进行更多借贷的可能性。【原文：Suriname, which is on the verge of becoming a major South American energy producer, is ruling out more borrowing against future oil production, according to its finance minister.】

item.title: 纽约证券交易所将 Arca 交易所的每日交易时间延长至 22 小时
item.description: 纽约证券交易所利用全球对美股的需求，将其 Arca 股票交易场所的交易时间延长至工作日的 22 小时。【原文：The New York Stock Exchange is extending trading on its Arca equities venue to 22 hours on weekdays, capitalizing on global demand for US stocks.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行在英国投资者黑池交易诉讼案中赢得法院减值裁决
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）因其暗池交易系统被投资者指控而在伦敦提起诉讼，在法官驳回一系列索赔要求后，巴克莱银行赢得了削减一半以上诉讼金额的请求。【原文：Barclays Plc won a bid to cut more than half of the value of a London lawsuit brought by investors over allegations about its dark pool trading system after a judge struck out a series of claims.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织警告津巴布韦黄金支持的 ZiG 无法解决更深层次的问题
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）表示，津巴布韦不会通过黄金支持的 ZiG 货币来解决其经济挑战。【原文：Zimbabwe won’t solve its economic challenges via the gold-backed ZiG currency that it launched in April and has since had to devalue, the International Monetary Fund said.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）上调 2025 年非洲经济增长预测，动荡局势为前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）将明年撒哈拉以南非洲地区的经济增长预期上调至 2021 年以来的最高水平，同时警告说，包括社会动荡在内的各种因素造成了不确定性的上升。【原文：The International Monetary Fund raised its economic growth forecast for sub-Saharan Africa next year to the highest since 2021, while warning that factors including social unrest create elevated uncertainty.】

item.title: 肯尼亚法院暂停 7.36 亿美元的阿达尼电力线路建设交易
item.description: 肯尼亚一家法院中止了政府允许印度阿达尼集团建设和运营高压输电线路 30 年、价值 7.36 亿美元的交易。【原文：A Kenyan court suspended a $736 million government deal to allow India’s Adani Group to build and operate high-voltage power transmission lines for 30 years.】

item.title: 美国的波音大问题
item.description: 大家好，欢迎阅读《奇点》时事通讯，它是来自《奇点》世界的每日内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 时钟变化将引发电力市场交易商的头痛
item.description:
欧洲夏令时于周日结束，北美夏令时于一周后结束。【原文：

Daylight saving time ends Sunday in Europe and a week later in North America.

】

item.title: 据说土耳其考虑在 2025 年不增加部分税收以应对通货膨胀
item.description: 据知情人士透露，土耳其官员正在讨论在新年伊始绕过对商品加税的做法，以帮助抑制通货膨胀。【原文：Turkish officials are discussing bypassing some tax raises on goods at the start of the new year to help quell inflation, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 由于 "不切实际 "的预期使 KeyBanc 看跌苹果，苹果获得卖出评级
item.description: KeyBanc Capital Markets 认为，对苹果公司各项业务广泛反弹的预期是不切实际的。【原文：Expectations for a broad rebound across Apple Inc.’s businesses are unrealistic, according to KeyBanc Capital Markets.】

item.title: 汽车金融上诉败诉后关闭兄弟公司业绩下滑
item.description: 关闭兄弟集团公司（Close Brothers Group Plc）的股票暴跌，原因是该公司在向汽车贷款客户披露信息的义务问题上败诉，该公司称此举可能导致其业务 "承担重大责任"。【原文：Shares of Close Brothers Group Plc plunged after it lost a court ruling over its disclosure obligations for customers taking out car loans, in a move the lender said could result in “significant liabilities” for its business.】

item.title: KKR 旗下 Selecta 聘用顾问应对即将到来的到期日
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，KKR & Co Inc.【原文：KKR & Co Inc.-owned Selecta Group BV has hired advisers to help it deal with upcoming maturities, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 顶级风力涡轮机制造商公布利润因成本下降而飙升
item.description: 全球最大的风力涡轮机制造商金风科技股份有限公司（Goldwind Science & Technology Co.【原文：Goldwind Science & Technology Co., the world’s biggest wind-turbine manufacturer, reported third-quarter profit growth thanks to lower production costs and China’s rapid buildout of clean energy.】

item.title: 2009 年以来英国住房开工率最低揭示工党面临的挑战
item.description: 英国新一届工党政府上台之初，英格兰的房屋开工率创下了近 15 年来最差的 12 个月，这凸显了新政府在推动建筑业繁荣方面所面临的巨大挑战。【原文：The UK’s new Labour government entered office off the back of the worst 12 months for housing starts in England in almost 15 years, underscoring the scale of the challenge it faces to spur a construction boom.】

item.title: 航空公司创新 "羞辱跳线者 "的科学方法
item.description: 美国航空公司正在试用一种新的技术功能来识别剪线工人。但首先...【原文：American Airlines is trying out a new technology feature to identify line cutters. But first...】
